articles.content: Content creators, rejoice! Explore Director Mode on Snapchat to edit video timelines in real-time and capture content using two displays simultaneously.

articles.author: Tushar Goenka
articles.title: The era of the operator founder: Why investors love departing startup executives - Moneycontrol
articles.description: While a majority of the departing executives are going back into the ecosystem and starting a new business, a small portion of them have chosen to simply change their sectors. The remaining are going back to safety.
